full_summary:
# Tender Notice for Ballistic Helmets with Integrated Communication and Hearing Protection

## Issuing Entity
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is the issuing entity for this tender notice.

## Solicitation Information
* Title: Supply and Delivery of Ballistic Helmets with Integrated Communication and Hearing Protection (2)
* Solicitation Number: WS3888910991
* Amendment Number: 2
* Publication Date: May 26, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: June 12, 2023 (14:00)
* Amendment Date: June 8, 2023
* Expected Contract Start Date: April 30, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: N/A
* Tender Status: Expired

## Description
Correctional Services Canada (CSC) requires the supply and delivery of 17 Ballistic Helmets with Integrated Communication and Hearing Protection for the Regional Psychiatric Centre in Saskatoon. A complete list of mandatory specifications can be found in the Annex- Statement of Requirement.

## Procurement Information
* Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Contract Details
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contracting Entity Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada
* End User Entity: Correctional Service of Canada (CSC)
* End User Entity Address: 340 Laurier Ave W, Ottawa, ON, K1P 0P9, Canada

## Contact Information
For more information, please contact Ruwani Wall (SPAC/PSPC) at ruwani.wall@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

## Tender Documentation
The tender notice and annexes can be accessed via the link to the government's procurement website: [http://...](http://...).
